articles.title: SA hockey men launch comeback to sink Germany, register 1st win in Tokyo - News24
articles.description: The South African men's hockey team have won their first match at the Tokyo Olympics, beating Germany on Thursday.
articles.content:
The South African men's hockey team have won their first match at the Tokyo Olympics after beating Germany 4-3 on Thursday.
